§ Green Mann

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

In the [[world-18]] //animation// and //fictional world//, the **Green Mann** is part of the [[world-18-titles]].

The **Green Mann** is an ancient title given to a single [[sabzii]].

Many, if not most, [[sabzii]] revere and exalt the **Green Mann**.

Some [[sabzii]] even think of the **Green Mann** as a deity.

The **Green Mann** title is passed down from father to his 7th son.
